verses.verse: And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou shalt hearken <S%H8085>diligently<s%> <S%H8085><s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>set<s%> thee on <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1293>blessings<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> thee, and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> thee, <S%H3588>if<s%> thou shalt <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt <S%H859>thou<s%> be in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> shalt <S%H859>thou<s%> be in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H990>body,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>ground,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H929>cattle,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of thy <S%H504>kine,<s%> and the <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of thy <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be thy <S%H2935>basket<s%> and thy <S%H4863>store.<s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt <S%H859>thou<s%> be when thou comest <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> shalt <S%H859>thou<s%> be when thou goest <S%H3318>out.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>cause<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee to be <S%H5062>smitten<s%> before thy <S%H6440>face:<s%> they shall come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> thee <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> <S%H854>upon<s%> thee in thy <S%H618>storehouses,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> that thou <S%H4916>settest<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto; and he shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6965>establish<s%> thee a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto himself, <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto thee, <S%H3588>if<s%> thou shalt <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou art <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and they shall be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> thee.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall make thee <S%H3498>plenteous<s%> in <S%H2896>goods,<s%> in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H990>body,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>ground,<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> thee.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6605>open<s%> unto <S%H853>thee<s%> his <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H214>treasure,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> unto thy <S%H776>land<s%> in his <S%H6256>season,<s%> and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3867>lend<s%> unto <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3867>borrow.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>make<s%> thee the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H2180>tail;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> <S%H7535>only,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4295>beneath;<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> that thou <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> them:

And thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H5493>aside<s%> from <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left,<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them.

But it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou wilt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day;<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> thee:
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt <S%H859>thou<s%> be in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H779>cursed<s%> shalt <S%H859>thou<s%> be in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be thy <S%H2935>basket<s%> and thy <S%H4863>store.<s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H990>body,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>land,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of thy <S%H504>kine,<s%> and the <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of thy <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt <S%H859>thou<s%> be when thou comest <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H779>cursed<s%> shalt <S%H859>thou<s%> be when thou goest <S%H3318>out.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> upon <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H3994>cursing,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4103>vexation,<s%> and <S%H4045>rebuke,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that thou <S%H4916>settest<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto <S%H834>for<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> thou be <S%H8045>destroyed,<s%> and <S%H5704>until<s%> thou <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4118>quickly;<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H7455>wickedness<s%> of thy <S%H4611>doings,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> thou hast <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H853>make<s%> the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto thee, <S%H5704>until<s%> he have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> thee from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H935>goest<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee with a <S%H7829>consumption,<s%> and with a <S%H6920>fever,<s%> and with an <S%H1816>inflammation,<s%> and with an extreme <S%H2746>burning,<s%> and with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and with <S%H7711>blasting,<s%> and with <S%H3420>mildew;<s%> and they shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> thee <S%H5704>until<s%> thou <S%H6>perish.<s%>

And thy <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>over<s%> thy <S%H7218>head<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H8478>under<s%> thee shall be <S%H1270>iron.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of thy <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H80>powder<s%> and <S%H6083>dust:<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> shall it come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, <S%H5704>until<s%> thou be <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>cause<s%> thee to be <S%H5062>smitten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies:<s%> thou shalt go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> them, and <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them: and shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2189>removed<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And thy <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3978>meat<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air,<s%> and unto the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and no <S%H369>man<s%> shall frighten them <S%H2729>away.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee with the <S%H7822>botch<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and with the <S%H6076>emerods,<s%> and with the <S%H1618>scab,<s%> and with the <S%H2775>itch,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> thou <S%H3201>canst<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7495>healed.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee with <S%H7697>madness,<s%> and <S%H5788>blindness,<s%> and <S%H8541>astonishment<s%> of heart: <S%H3824><s%>

And thou <S%H1961>shalt<s%> <S%H4959>grope<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H4959>gropeth<s%> in <S%H653>darkness,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6743>prosper<s%> <S%H853><s%> in thy <S%H1870>ways:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> <S%H3605>evermore,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> and no <S%H369>man<s%> shall <S%H3467>save<s%> thee.

Thou shalt <S%H781>betroth<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall lie <S%H7901>with<s%> her: thou shalt <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein: thou shalt <S%H5193>plant<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> and shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> gather the <S%H2490>grapes<s%> thereof.

Thine <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H2873>slain<s%> before thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>thereof:<s%> thine <S%H2543>ass<s%> shall be violently taken <S%H1497>away<s%> from before thy <S%H4480>face,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7725>restored<s%> to thee: thy <S%H6629>sheep<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and thou shalt have <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3467>rescue<s%> them.

Thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>look,<s%> and <S%H3616>fail<s%> with longing <S%H413>for<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long: and there shall be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H410>might<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>land,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H3018>labors,<s%> shall a <S%H5971>nation<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> eat <S%H398>up;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H7533>crushed<s%> <S%H3605>always:<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
So that thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7696>mad<s%> for the <S%H4480>sight<s%> <S%H4758><s%> of thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H7200>see.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H7785>legs,<s%> with a <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H7822>botch<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H7495>healed,<s%> from the <S%H4480>sole<s%> <S%H3709><s%> of thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the top of thy <S%H6936>head.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1980>bring<s%> thee, and thy <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H6965>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> thee, <S%H413>unto<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> nor thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H3045>known;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> shalt thou <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H1961>become<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> and a <S%H8148>byword,<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>nations<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> thee.

Thou shalt carry much seed <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7227><s%> <S%H2233><s%> into the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and shalt gather but little <S%H622>in;<s%> <S%H4592><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H697>locust<s%> shall <S%H2628>consume<s%> it.

Thou shalt <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H5647>dress<s%> them, but shalt <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H103>gather<s%> the grapes; <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H8438>worms<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> them.

Thou shalt <S%H1961>have<s%> olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H1366>coasts,<s%> but thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5480>anoint<s%> thyself with the <S%H8081>oil;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thine <S%H2132>olive<s%> shall <S%H5394>cast<s%> his fruit.

Thou shalt <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> but thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>enjoy<s%> them; <S%H3588>for<s%> they shall <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> thy <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>land<s%> shall the <S%H6767>locust<s%> <S%H3423>consume.<s%>

The <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H7130>within<s%> thee shall get <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> thee very <S%H4605>high;<s%> <S%H4605><s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt come <S%H3381>down<s%> very <S%H4295>low.<s%> <S%H4295><s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> shall <S%H3867>lend<s%> to thee, and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3867>lend<s%> to him: <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H2180>tail.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> thee, and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> thee, <S%H5704>till<s%> thou be <S%H8045>destroyed;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thou <S%H8085>hearkenedst<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee:
And they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> upon thee for a <S%H226>sign<s%> and for a <S%H4159>wonder,<s%> and upon thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>
